abstractText: A Nepalese paper manuscript of the Kuliśeśvarabhāvanāguhya, in sixteen chapters; probably a Buddhist tantric text on meditation and mental visualization.
abstractShort: A Nepalese paper manuscript of the Kuliśeśvarabhāvanāguhya, in sixteen chapters; probably a Buddhist tantric text on meditation
title: Kuliśeśvarabhāvanāguhya
